name: MKInput
description:
Requires Codea 3.5

Provides advanced mouse & keyboard input callbacks:
- mouseup(button)
- mousedown(button)
- mousemove(deltaX, deltaY)
- keydown(key)
- keyup(key)

Polling is also available:
- iskeydown(key)
- ismousedown(button)

Cursor hiding:
- hidecursor(shouldHide)
